remarks: Closure law for the vector addition (group) operation of a normed complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvgcl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvgcl.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvgcl $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A G B ) e. X ) $.
